topic.title: BTree get function correction
topic.text:
Barkeshli said NOT to use the code on the BTree assignment for get.

It's because since that get was recursive, then you won't be able to insert from the top of the BTree if you traversed all the way to a leaf already. 

Instead, check if it contains the entry. If it's not there then insert, then return the entry reference.

You may need to make another function (recursive) called get_existing that should assert if the entry you give it is not really there.

edit:

Or you can just implement this in Map/ Multimap because you have a _key_count to keep track of. Up to you.
